branchCategory.name: Vacuum
branchCategory.description: <p>Anti-static suction cups are available in conductive NBR or anti-static urethane. The urethane pad surface resistance 109 to 1011&Omega;. Anti-static vacuum pad attachment is made from a conductive PEEK material</p>

branchItem.name: ZPR Static Conductive Suction Cup, Lateral Entry
branchItem.description: <p>The ZPR series static conductive suction cups are used in applications where the workpiece is sensitive to damage from static electricity discharge, such as electronics.  Conductive suction cups can also be used to prevent the suction cup from sticking to the workpiece due to static electricity.</p>

branchItem.name: ZPY Static Conductive Suction Cup, Lateral Entry with Barb Fitting
branchItem.description: <p>The ZPY series static conductive suction cups are used in applications where the workpiece is sensitive to damage from static electricity discharge, such as electronics.  Conductive suction cups can also be used to prevent the suction cup from sticking to the workpiece due to static electricity.</p>

branchItem.name: ZPT Static Conductive Suction Cup, Vertical Entry
branchItem.description: <p>The ZPY series static conductive suction cups are used in applications where the workpiece is sensitive to damage from static electricity discharge, such as electronics.  Conductive suction cups can also be used to prevent the suction cup from sticking to the workpiece due to static electricity.</p>
